titles.title: To amend title V of the Social Security Act to convert funding for personal responsibility education programs from direct appropriations to an authorization of appropriations.
To amend title V of the Social Security Act to convert funding for personal responsibility education programs from direct appropriations to an authorization of appropriations.

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Reported by the Committee on Energy and Commerce. H. Rept. 112-63.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 31.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Amends title V (Maternal and Child Health Services) of the Social Security Act to change the funding mechanism for personal responsibility education programs from direct appropriations to an authorization of appropriations, and rescinds unobligated funds available to such programs.
